thread.title: Massacre at US college: Psycho student fires random shots, kills 13, more than 20 injured
thread.title_full: Massacre at US college: Psycho student fires random shots, kills 13, more than 20 injured

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Massacre at US college: Psycho student fires random shots, kills 13, more than 20 injured
text:
Comments 
San Francisco, Oct 2: A shooting at a college in the US state of Oregon on Thursday killed 10 people and injured 20 others, the media reported. The campus of the community college has been cordoned off by the security forces. Details of the shooting, as well as the alleged shooter, at the Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon, were not immediately known, Xinhua news agency reported. A local fire department confirmed the shooting on Twitter and advised people to stay away from the area. The evacuation of students and staff of the institution is underway. (ALSO READ: US campus shooting leaves one dead) 
Mercy Medical Center in Roseburg wrote on Twitter that it received nine patients from the college and three more are en route. According to CNN, the psycho student reportedly informed a close group of students a day earlier about his sinister plan. 
Modified Date: October 2, 2015 3:15 AM Topics:
